description: The Open Library of Humanities aims to provide a platform for Open Access publishing that is: Reputable and respected through rigorous peer review Sustainable Digitally preserved and safely archived in perpetuity Non-profit Open in both monetary and permission terms Non-discriminatory (APCs are waiverable) Technically innovative in response to the needs of scholars and librarians A solution to the serials crisis HomeAbout » Media » Get Involved » Committees
